  • Changelog

    Helper functions for ComBat.NA

    postmean.Rd

    These functions perform the Bayesian adjustments to the batch effects They do this in a iterative way.

    Credit goes to the original authors of the sva package.

    postmean(g.hat, g.bar, n, d.star, t2)

it.sol(sdat, g.hat, d.hat, g.bar, t2, a, b, conv = 1e-04)

postvar(sum2, n, a, b)

    Arguments

    g.hat

    additive batch effect

    g.bar

    additive batch effect mean

    n

    number of samples in batch

    d.star

    bayes adjusted multiplicative effect

    t2

    additive batch effect variance

    sdat

    standardized data

    d.hat

    multiplicative batch effect

    a

    shape parameter

    b

    rate parameter

    conv

    relative change threshold, determines when to stop iteration

    sum2

    internal variable, used in Bayesian estimation of batch effects

    Functions

    • it.sol():

    • postvar():

    Contents

    Developed by Vladislav Petyuk.
